website_summaries.verdict: Award-winning wetsuit with flexible fabric that feels like second skin and performs for professionals.
pros: This award-winning wetsuit is Ironman approved
Whisks through water, providing warmth and a natural fit
Hydrodynamic neoprene made from Yamamoto #39 and #40
Adapts well to a variety of body sizes
cons: Takes time to get on the first time, but is well worth the effort

customer_reviews.title: the Synergy is wonderful. Nice relaxed fit in the shoulders with plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing and trying two TYR wet suits, (sleeveless and full) and an older de soto, which always seemed to tight, despite the fit guide, the Synergy is wonderful. Nice relaxed fit in the shoulders with plenty of length in the arms and legs...I am 5'10 at 158 lbs, with a long inseam and short ertorso and the fit guide is very accurate. Very good value for the money. Especially easy to get off during transitions and quite comfortable with triathlon gear underneath (tri shorts/top). I wore compression socks underneath without any issues. Highly recommend this wet-suit to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wet suit for triathlons, so I can't make comparisons with previous suits, also, I recently used this in my first 70.3 triathlon. First, the logistics - the suite arrived in two days in solid packaging with messaging about putting it on, etc. The sizing chart is spot on and the suit is a perfect fit, great range of motion in the upper body without any chafing. As for performance, after the first swim, no tears, no issues, no chafing and the 5mm provides good flotation on the open water. All of the seams are taped on the inside in key areas and it absolutely feels good, in fact I wanted to keep swimming!
customer_reviews.author: JonDenver

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic triathlon wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic triathlon wetsuit. So many wonderful things to say... First off the sizing chart they provide is spot on. Follow it exactly and you will get the perfect size. It is like this suit was custom made for me. The wetsuit itself is great. It is excellent quality (especially for the price). It gives full range of motion in the arms and shoulders and does not choke at the neck. Very comfortable for long open water swims and easy to get on and off. I also appreciate how Synergy provides good information on how to put on, take off, care for the wetsuit. Overall an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: BigMike56

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Excellent fit once sized properly.
customer_reviews.text: My wife swims in 52-54 degree F water in the summer. Our local pool is closed due to covid. She is 5’7 and about 220. We tried the women’s largest suit and it was way too small we went for the men’s L3 and it fit perfect. She has very muscular legs and arms. This suit is perfect. Because of her muscles the men’s longer suit worked really well. It fit her height just fine even though it was for 6’++ Combined with the gloves and neoprene socks she swims for 45 minutes with ease. Well see what autumn brings for cold temps. Hope we can keep her warm.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Hard seam on the collar that rubs neck really bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall seems to be good. I only swam 3 times so far, water was 60-ish, and it was very comfortable. No issues with motion, easy to put in and take off. However there's a little piece of the neck (about an inch), that has glue on it, which makes it sharp/hard. This part rubs on neck, to a point of drawing blood :( I cut down this glued edge with scissors, i will update the review if it helps. —— Update: cutting out glued part helped a lot. No more rubbing in one spot. I also started to apply body glide around the neck, and no issues. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Max Herman

customer_reviews.title: The rep was super friendly and took time to listen
customer_reviews.text: My husband's suit seemed tight, so I called Synergy. The rep was super friendly and took time to listen. She advised that for his weight and height that the size of the suit was most likely right, and he should try it in the water a few times and it would stretch. If not we could return it. My husband had wanted to immediately return it and I'm so glad I called because she was right. It turned out to be a perfect size and he even said it felt like it was custom made for him.
customer_reviews.author: DebbyDoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and service: ordered 2 sizes, returned the one that didn't fit as well for quick full refund. Well made with reinforcements in all the stress areas. Great fit and good range of motion for open water. 55o San Francisco Bay water temps and I was toasty. (used with hood, boots, and 5mm gloves)
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best wetsuit I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: At 6'1" and 175 pounds, I was initially skeptical that the M3 size would work for me, but the fit is perfect. The suit allows great range of motion and keeps me comfortably warm in the 60 degree waters of our cove here on the coast of Maine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I raced for one season so far in this wetsuit, and it has been a great purchase. It is slightly restricting in the shoulders (but not too bad), but that's to be expected at this price point. The suit has held up well - no tears or problems after using it in 5 or 6 races. Most of my races require hours of travel, and this suit has held up nicely. I have had no trouble with the zipper. The suit does everything I had hoped and more, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: FL Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Suit
customer_reviews.text: I wore this suit during the Ironman 70.3 World Championships in the very fresh/chilly Indian Ocean (60.5, 61, and 66 degree swims), and this thing kept me warm. I liked the panels on the lats, and I had no issues or concerns with shoulder tightness or that feeling on being constrained. I couldn't believe how comfortable this suit was! Buy this thing now if you expect to do a lot of open water swims. I also have the farmer john shorty style to give me options in warmer waters and ambient temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: RVA-Steve

customer_reviews.title: This has proven to be a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my first triathlon. It is a difference maker for a person like me who is an average swimmer and really benefited from the targeted buoyancy and comfort. My only regret, I waited for the water temp to get into the upper 50*s and I could have been swimming weeks ago because the suit kept me so comfortable and warm. This was a great buy and so glad I didn't try to save a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, great price
customer_reviews.text: This suit has amazing flexibility, you definitely feel less constriction for breathing and arm movement. The stretch also makes it easier to get on and off than any other suit I have tried. This is the most comfortable wetsuit I have owned. It is not as buoyant as my 2 piece Desoto but may!!! nicer to wear and much better shoulder mobility. Plus at this price I could buy 3 for the price of the Desoto!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENT!!
customer_reviews.text: In Brazil, Its not a famous brand I bought because has a good rewiew in all places i looked I use this to trainning for triathlon In my experience, it is a EXCELENT equipament to swim. Works good to moviments in arms. Works VERY good in cold water and cold wind Better than others famous brands i used other times I strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LUCAZ

customer_reviews.title: Bought this and did my first one with it and loved it. I'm no expert on such suits
customer_reviews.text: Did a few short triathlons without a suit and was terrified. I'm afraid of open water swimming. Bought this and did my first one with it and loved it. I'm no expert on such suits, but amateurs like me (50-something non-athlete) might enjoy having the buoyancy. Web site provided great fit measurements, and I could get in and out of it without any help. The flotation design makes it a little tough to do the breast stroke, but other strokes were great. Swam with confidence and cut two minutes off my swim time.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Trainin OWS
customer_reviews.text: Nice suit, perfect for the current weather condition here in Las Vegas. I used it for OWS at Lake Mead. It protects you from the low temps. and keeps your body heat within. Range of motion is not limited. Can't wait to use it again this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: tingoloy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! I was able to zip the suit by myself. I suggest like someone else did already to leave the zipper up to almost mid back about 10 inches up. I tried it at the pool 60 degrees F. Works well. It is flexible and I can swim normally. My body remained warm.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: Design, Quality and high standard
customer_reviews.text: I got it almost month ago, and I just love it. I can only say amazing quality, materials and work. All works fine, the graph of sizes works just perfect. Use it when order. Swimming suit is great for Triathlon. If you are looking for freediving stuff, might not be the best, since you will need extra weights for diving. In anyway, for freeding you need also head suit one piece. But for Triathlon, best what I ever tried. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Liyri Art

customer_reviews.title: warmth without bulk
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn't like confining clothing (he never wears long sleeves!). He ordered this because of the lower neckline than other wet suits. Not only is the neckline lower, but it is more flexible than other suits of the same thickness. He uses it for scuba diving and it maintains the warmth of suits that are thicker and stiffer. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: baabaa

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value! I originally ordered the S3 (I'm 5'9" and 150 lbs), but returned it for the M1 which is perfect. Make sure you go to the Synergy website and check out the detailed instructions on how to properly put the suit on. This dramatically affects the fit. Like I said, you can't find a suit of this quality at this price point...period.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan

customer_reviews.title: It feels great. I trashed my 18 yr old Qintanna Roo ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to try it out yet but, It feels great. I trashed my 18 yr old Qintanna Roo because it wouldn't streatch any more and I couldn't get into it. The Synergy fits and feels great, especially in the shoulder area. I have my first triathlon in March (after 18yrs.) and will let you know how the suit (and I) perform.
customer_reviews.author: Rino Jim

customer_reviews.title: SYNERGY IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: THE FIT WAS PERFECT AND THE EASE OF PUTTING IT ON AND TAKING IT OFF IS AWESOME! I AM TRAINING FOR A SWIM FROM ALCATRAZ ISLAND TO SAN FRANCISCO AND I TRAINED IN A LAKE THIS WEEKEND 2X DOING OPEN WATER SWIMS AND I LOVE THIS WETSUIT! LOVE IT! STEV-O
customer_reviews.author: StevO

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, works well, very comfortable. The only recommendation I would make is to consider a size slightly higher then recommended. I am ~6'3" and 200 lbs. The recommended size is L1 but I went with L2 and it is properly snug and fits well. This is my second Synergy suit. I have both the sleeveless for most swims and the long sleeve for Pacific Ocean and high Sierra lake swims.
customer_reviews.author: tc

customer_reviews.title: It was a little tight the first time I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tight the first time I tried, but as the instruction says, it becomes less tight when in water. I’m a beginner triathlete, had my first 2 open water swims. Water was at 60F and 70F. It was a little tight the first time I tried, but as the instruction says, it becomes less tight when in water and easier to put on the next time. I decided to get this brand based on favorable online reviews and the companies dedication to their products.
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Quality wet suite at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first timer and was looking for a good quality suite that was affordable. This suite fit well and has performed better than expected. Very buoyant and easy to swim in. Completed my first triathlon recently and had no issues getting the suite on (had some help with zipper) or off. Very happy with my purchase. I'm 5' 11" and currently at 178 lbs. I'm 56 and do not have a "triathlete" body. I tried both the M2 & M3. I could have pulled off the M2, but the M3 fit fine and provided a little more room around the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, snug fit. Easy to get in and out. Only complaint and it may be substantive for cold water swimmers: the sculpted cuffs on the legs do not alllow swimmer to wear booties! This feature is not visible on the product display. I am a cold water swimmer and was thus disappointed. Please Synergy make your suit to fully cover the bottom of the calf or uniformly design the leg cuff. Otherwise I was thrilled with fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Eagan

customer_reviews.title: I bought the M3 fit which fits perfect. It was a little tight getting on at ...
customer_reviews.text: First - Fit: I am 6'0 185 lbs with a muscular build. I bought the M3 fit which fits perfect. It was a little tight getting on at first but I think that's how it supposed to be. The suit feels good to wear, I don't feel that my shoulders get tired while swimming, and I feel significantly faster and more buoyant in the water. The quality of the suit seems to be solid. The price point is good vs. competition. It looks pretty good too. Note - This is my first and only wetsuit (bought for first upcoming triathlon), so I don't have a good point of comparison vs. other wetsuits. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile product
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile product, with a simple touch of the fingers when turning inside out, has already opened a small hole. I have another wetsuit and never got something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have had many wetsuits, but this is the highest quality I have seen for the price. All seams are stitched and glued. All seam intersections are reinforced. The neck closure flap on the back is reinforced with stitching and the zipper lanyard has Velcro on it so you can tuck it away to be more hydro. Adds a great deal of buoyancy. Fit was as expected. I save 5 stars for top of the line gear... This is very good though.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: Though I had problems zipping the back myself, once I got it the suit it felt great. And it swims great and kept me warm in the Pacific Ocean. I am loving this suit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Menduno

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and very soft with zero chafing.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this wetsuit. I have used it twice and is getting better each swim. With my purchase of this wetsuit the way I see it two people benefit from this purchase. Me because I get to wear it. The person that bought my Blueseventy on eBay is the other. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great Triathlon Wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: First ...I love this wetsuit. Great flotation and quality construction. I am 5'7" and weigh 117lb and the small s2 fits perfectly. I love the hydrophobic material. My only suggestion is to add a small car key stash somewhere inside. Other than that: great design, implementation, and price point. Thank you for a job well done!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brandes

customer_reviews.title: Great suit with excellent flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! Excellent flexibility across the full swimming range of motion. Much easier to get on and off than my last suit. Sizing chart was easy to use and worked like a charm. Got my wife one too (women's version).
customer_reviews.author: StevieD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome first wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8 , 170lbs and this wetsuit fits me perfectly! It is my first wetsuit and after swimming roughly 10,000m in it I have no complaints or issues and haven't experienced any chafing at all. I am looking forward to doing a half iron man in it later this summer. Hoping it lasts me a life time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of warranty needed in addition
customer_reviews.text: Too many warnings and you were encouraged to buy additional wet suit warranty against tears. To be fair I never tried it on bur purchased Xterra wet suit and noticed much better quality and glide in the water
customer_reviews.author: Daron Whisman

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I average 165 lbs and 5'9", the M2 was a perfect fit and is a high quality item. This is my first wetsuit. I took the opportunity to test out this wetsuit on a mile open water swim in preparation for a triathlon. I was satisfied with the added buoyancy and comfort. I also appreciated the how-to instructions found on the Synergy website. I look forward to many years of racing in this suit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suit! I ordered for an upcoming 24 race that includes mostly water based obstacles and some swimming and after just a couple training swims it now fits like it was custom made for me (I'm 5'7 and 155 and ordered medium). It's got amazing floatation and is very flexible with great movement in the arms. I also appreciate the ability to adjust the neck closure as I am pretty broad for my size and this doesn't feel too tight at all.
customer_reviews.author: chris g.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, tried a few wetsuits and the Synergy fit the best. I'm 5'8" and 180 and size M2 was too tight so reordered the M3 and fit great. Well made suit and durable. Did my first Tri last week and the suit felt great. No chaffing either.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wet suit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wetsuit for my first triathlon. Though I have not raced in it yet, I have trained in this wetsuit a number of times now and it is awesome. Very flexible and does not impede movement at all. Great wetsuit and is very fast. I am looking forward to my first race in this suit. I recommend this wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and fit
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This is my first wetsuit but it's been great in the few swims I've done so far. Construction seems excellent and the M2 fits perfectly (I'm 6' and 180lbs with a swimmer's body). Will update review with more use; 4 stars only because of limited use -- jury out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit, fit snug first try.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on, did my first open water swim about 1/2 mile. Had to take it off because it was too hot. Not the suits fault, it was in the 90's for weeks and the lake was well heated. My Ironman is in October and should be perfect temps for the suit. I hope to get a few more practice swims in before then, but I'm feeling good about the suit quality and fit. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit, switched from your basic Body Glove full ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome suit, switched from your basic Body Glove full suit about a month ago, huge difference in fit and function. Smooth skin is much faster, fit is great, very comfortable swimming in 54 degree water this time of year, suit dries quickly. Absolutely recommend it to anyone who is into open water swimming in colder water,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: This is the second wetsuit that I have owned. The fit chart helped me a lot(I love the adjustments based on leg to torso proportion and chest size). The suit is easy to put on and take off and does not restrict my breathing or arm movement. I feel it's bouyancy when swimming and have already taken 3 minutes off my 1.5k swim time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is buoyant in the right places and allows for comfortable arm and shoulder movement
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the suit for a 70.3 half Iron Man. My ocean training has been much easier in this well designed suit. It is buoyant in the right places and allows for comfortable arm and shoulder movement. I had to do the training for the race, I needed a wetsuit that would do its job. It went beyond my expectations. I am 5'11'' and 180 Lbs with a big chest and needed an M3 size. At first I had a M2 and the exchange process was easy. Overall it is an excellent wetsuit and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent fit and handles Alaska’s arctic rivers just fine.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent fit and handles Alaska’s arctic rivers just fine. I can stay in the river up to an hour before I get the chill factor. Thats saying alot.
customer_reviews.author: AK Wireless

customer_reviews.title: so know a good fit). The suit is superior to the other ...
customer_reviews.text: In ordered size M2..I am 158# and 5’10 tall.. medium build. (I have been swimming in wetsuits for at least 25 years..so know a good fit). The suit is superior to the other 3 that I own ..period ..but I had to exchange to size M3..perfect fit. So perhaps the sizing chart is in the small side. All things considered ..a great suit at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Clint Brookhart

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to swimming . Bought this to train for a 70.3 very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rzeznik

customer_reviews.title: Good item just like pictures
customer_reviews.text: The suit needs to be one size bigger but didn't offer it on web site it's a little tighter than should be.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip guess

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable, flexible, lightweight, and far less anxiety provoking than my other wetsuit which was constricting to my shoulders and made it hard to breathe unless I loosened the neck. I was still warm, able to float well, and for the first time did my 800 m swim in open water without having to get my breath in backstroke position. I'd highly recommend this suit. I have the P3 and I am 5'5" and about 120#.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Turner

customer_reviews.title: great suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice swimmer and have only used the suit for 3 open water swims thus far but am happy with the fit, flexibility and flotation. I'm 6'4" and weight 205 and the L1 fits well - snug - but well. I've been in relatively warm water -low 70's for up to an hour and the suit is quite warm. I imagine I could swim in much colder water and still have no trouble keeping warm. Very pleased with this suit for the price - nothing negative to mention thus far
customer_reviews.author: Soren Olson

customer_reviews.title: Super Stretch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for windsurfing. Super satisfied. I hope there is a neck-warmer(covering backbone), too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I'm sure I will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It was more than i expected! I live in Rio de Janeiro / Brazil, and this type of clothing, with this quality, here, is very expensive. I have not used it yet, but I'm sure I will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Pastana de Lugao

customer_reviews.title: 5'11" 165lbs - M1 Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return and get sleeveless version in size M2, which fits.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor F

customer_reviews.title: felt a bit tight, loose space around butt
customer_reviews.text: not yet worn in any of the open water but hoping it'll be okay. when putting on looks good, okay to move, but some difficulty zipping up on my own probably due to tightness. good item for my purpose sea swimming.
customer_reviews.author: KANG KIM

customer_reviews.title: Chest and Shoulders too tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a L1 suit. I'm 195 lbs and 5'11". I figured since I was at the lower end of the range this would fit fine. Unfortunately I have broader shoulders and the chest area was too tight. This inhibited my breathing when in the water. I'll be getting a larger size. The suit itself is nice and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: John V

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for TRI
customer_reviews.text: The swim portion of the triathlon always feels like a survival course before but now since I worn it for my Olympic Triathlon last weeks I love it so much because my stress bar it went so much the suit not only keeps you from freezing in the Pacific Ocean but it also helps you flows that means you can conserve more energy to swim longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Su

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be the most comfortable wet-suit I've had in many years
customer_reviews.text: Thus far I've only gotten to use the suit for running in the rain a few times. Even so, it seems to be the most comfortable wet-suit I've had in many years.
customer_reviews.author: Live Sound Guy 106

customer_reviews.title: It takes some getting used to the amount of buoyancy ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes some getting used to the amount of buoyancy provided by this suit. My only complaint is that it causes a lot of chaffing on the back of my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike88222

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent, very flexible and easy to put it on
customer_reviews.text: This a review before using the product. The quality is excellent, very flexible and easy to put it on. The underarms seems to be very flexible to have a comfortable swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth suit in the water
customer_reviews.text: Nice and smooth suit in the water.i found out the hard way if you are over 210 lbs. Go with an L-3 suit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Nice warm wetsuit. Used about 6-7 times already have a hole in it from seam busting. Doesn't effect me much but who wants to have holes in there suit. Doesn't restrict arm movement, good bouyancy, I glide through the water in it. If you aren't gonna use it often probably last but I probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SallyV74

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item and it ripped within 5 uses. We have contacted the customer service multiple times and are not receiving a response despite contacting them for the last 2 months. I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality... tried it in a 70.3 Ironman and i liked it very much
customer_reviews.author: Bader

customer_reviews.title: the Synergy Endorphin was both the most comfortable and the easiest to take off (especially around the ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 different wetsuits (Zoot Z Force 1.0, TYR Hurricane Category 1 and this Synergy Endorphin) and for me, the Synergy Endorphin was both the most comfortable and the easiest to take off (especially around the ankles). The outer material also feels a little stronger than the TYR suit. Took it for my first swim last weekend in Lake Washington, and was impressed how warm it kept me. Looking forward to my first 2 triathlons with this suit this summer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Helped enormously with my swim in last Ironman 70. ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped enormously with my swim in last Ironman 70.3. Near-perfect fit. All my triathlon wear is Synergy and will continue to be.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Farquhar

customer_reviews.title: Great suit at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Follow the figment guide and you cannot go wrong. Suit loosened up slightly after use, fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DirtyDogAK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great suit at a reasonable price. Used it for two years no issues
customer_reviews.author: John R. Kinnecom

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: So stretchy! I have always done a sleeveless wetsuit so I was worried I'd feel restricted in the shoulders but I don't at ALL! I love swimming in this thing. I found the sizing based on measurements to be spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product provides good fit and instructions to put on was very helpful. I recommend this product without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: alvinleejohnson

customer_reviews.title: A good fit not too tight
customer_reviews.text: It fits me fine and I don't have a typical body type. Over 250 lbs small waist and big back. Is a little tight in the back and I need somebody to zip up the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure what size to order and customer service was great in helping me pick the correct size
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn the wetsuit in an actual Triathlon yet as the water was warm. I wasn't sure what size to order and customer service was great in helping me pick the correct size. It fit perfectly when i tried it on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit. I've used for a half ironman and other swims and was warm and buoyant. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Got this wetsuit and I really like it. Fits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Got this wetsuit and I really like it. Fits comfortably, easy to put on and looks pretty spiffy. I really like the added bouyancy features as I have had trouble with sinking (I am a rookie swimmer and beginner triathlete) I recommend this wetsuit for all levels of swimmers and triathletes
customer_reviews.author: Philip Stein

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Great warranty. Great company. Had a question about the purchase and talked to the President himself. Very comfortable wetsuit and seems to be made of a quality flexible material that will last a lot longer than my Xterra did. Time will tell, though, as this is still new.
customer_reviews.author: David Katz

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: IM 5’6 155 pounds and had to size up, still tight but tolerable. Took three tries, return/exchange process was easy.
customer_reviews.author: WCCF

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this wetsuit! He worn it for ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wetsuit! He worn it for his first iron man race and cut swim time by 10min!
customer_reviews.author: A Naturalist

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn the suit in anger yet, but it fits really well, is easy to get on and especially like the support and comfort it provides. The finishes are good and since I have worn a custom 3-2-1 for many years, this seems like it is durable and will not fail. The ankles and neck features reflect a lot of thought into the suits design.
customer_reviews.author: R N SAWYER JR MD

customer_reviews.title: It works better than I could have imagined
customer_reviews.text: Warmest wetsuit I have ever owned. Very light, dries quickly. I use it for surfing. It works better than I could have imagined. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for the price. Nice quality, size chart is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine once got the right size.
customer_reviews.text: The suit fit fine, though I had to send back the M2 for the M3, even though the fitting chart suggested the M2 for 5'9" and 170 #. Have worn it twice and it feels pretty comfortable, definitely more buoyant, and even a bit warm. The return through Amazon was easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Roger F

customer_reviews.title: Where it is made
customer_reviews.text: Cannot identify where this suit is made ..USA or somewhere else I want to choose where the products I buy are made
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Fast and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Completed Ironman swim in these. You can't sink in them so make you feel safe. keep you in perfect streamline so was hardy kicking.Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohit Kumar

customer_reviews.title: great suit
customer_reviews.text: The m3 fit me great. I'm 6'1" and 185 lbs. I'm a slim build. If that helps anyone. Its a beautiful suit. Not hard to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: We've only had a few swims but this suit has ...
customer_reviews.text: We've only had a few swims but this suit has served me well. This weekend's temp was 59F and this suit worked well. Based on reviews, I was careful not to snag/scratch the suit. The sizing was right (as was my wife's) using the chart.
customer_reviews.author: CommentingOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First wetsuit worked well for my first half ironman. Quality materials. Definitely recommend a wetsuit for long distance swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well. Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as my first Wet Suit ever and absolutely love it. This thing fits well and is extremely flexible. I'm 5'9 185 muscular build and the M3 fits like a glove. Good buoyancy. Kept me and my poor swimming ability afloat to complete my first sprint tri back in August. Satisfied Customer :-)
customer_reviews.author: Smileychele

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Wet suit arrived as expected and was packaged well. It is true to size and is comfortable to wear. Have only used it once to try it out, but it does as promised and kept out the 35 degree cold of our outdoor pool water sufficiently. Looking forward to how it holds up during a triathlon, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Caris

customer_reviews.title: Toasty and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Wow, never thought I would be able to swim in a wetsuit! Kept me toasty and my arms moving freely in 60 degree Lake Washington water. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Woodchuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing suit, buoyant and warm, fits perfectly. I'm 6'1" 177lb and I wore an M3.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit fit great. I have swam in the lake near my ...
customer_reviews.text: Received order as expected. Wetsuit fit great. I have swam in the lake near my house and the suit performed fantastically. I felt very comfortable swimming around. Will order from Synergy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rawlinson

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: After researching many suits, this is the suit I chose. I am happy with my choice. It is flexible in the shoulders and the first one fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! Super warm and very comfortable! I have been running in sub zero temps and don't know how I ever got along without it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Garrahy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great first wetsuit...felt like I wash on top of the water
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, mobility, and warmth
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time a couple days ago. I’m using it for open water swims in a lake while training for a triathlon. Perfect fit, good mobility, and kept me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great instructions and follow up! Fits as advertised. Can’t wait till spring to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Philip K Hornseth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suit in every way. The best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money, make sure to follow the guide!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and feels great! I am 5'11" and 245lbs and I purchased the L2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit, fit likes a glove. My arms move like it is a sleeveless although it is fullsleeve. I recommend this product for anyone who wants to improve their swim time.
customer_reviews.author: davinm23

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super flexible, very comfortable, light and great quality. Very happy with this wetsuit
customer_reviews.author: José Vélez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Great Value! Quality product, great warranty, accurate sizing. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Blessing

customer_reviews.title: The Endorphin is a great wetsuit. It fits well and has an amazing ...
customer_reviews.text: The Endorphin is a great wetsuit. It fits well and has an amazing flexibility. Does not restrict swimming in any way and it is easy to take off. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Synergy Triathlon Wetsuit 5/3mm - Men’s Endorphin Full Sleeve Smoothskin Neoprene for Open Water Swimming Ironman & USAT Approved
feature_bullets: TRIATHLETE MAGAZINE EDITOR'S CHOICE AWARD WINNER / LAVA MAGAZINE BEST VALUE WETSUIT – Suitable for all levels. Ironman & USAT approved. Athlete endorsed. Comes in wide range of sizes to ensure a perfect fit.

PROVEN TECHNOLOGY EQUALS SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE – Hydrodynamic neoprene made from Yamamoto #39 with SCS silicone coated SyPrene. 5mm thick core buoyancy panel / 3mm lower legs and back / 2mm arms and shoulders.

EXCEPTIONAL FUNCTIONALITY – Full range of motion. Unsurpassed 680 percent flexibility. Highest grade anti corrode internal wetsuit zipper from YKK which greatly reduces drag as you move through the water. Super soft low neck with smoothskin on both sides and because it is so soft, it feels like you hardly have anything around your neck.

MAXIMUM BUOYANCY - 5mm wetsuit, which is the maximum buoyancy allowed in triathlon wetsuits. Creates nearly double the buoyancy than 3mm suits, which are not recommended for cold waters. Float higher. Move faster. Save energy.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - 30-Day Guarantee: If you are not 100% satisfied within 30-days, send your new/unused wetsuit back for a full refund / 2 Year Warranty / Lifetime Replacement Guarantee (allows end-user to send in their used wetsuit at any time and receive 40% off MSRP).
